references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational technique used by the Neural Gaffer model for image generation and relighting.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: The NeRF paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields, which are leveraged by the authors for 3D relighting tasks in this paper, demonstrating the integration and application of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Deep relightable appearance models for animatable faces
references.reason: This work provides a strong baseline for single-view relighting, which the current paper builds upon, comparing and improving upon its category-agnostic approach and image quality.

This paper focuses on single-image portrait relighting, which serves as a specific category of the more general single-image relighting problem addressed by Neural Gaffer, providing a comparison point for performance.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces ControlNet, which enhances diffusion models by adding conditional control.  This is relevant to Neural Gaffer because it uses a similar approach of adding conditioning for relighting.
